column4: hi i've had a disaster, hope someone can help me. i just bought a new computer and i've put some bits from my old machine into new one. but now when i turn old one on it just beeps every couple of seconds, like an alarm with black screen, but it's got memory, a cd drive etc - i don't know what's gone wrong
can anyone please help me out?
i'm talking on new system now which works sweet but my girlfriend needs some stuff from old one!
